channel.title: Need help! (Jarring my server)
channel.description: Hello, i have currently been up for 16 hours straight about 6 of which i have been trying to figure out how to jar my server! i have watched countless tuts and they just end up not working and yes i have been using jar maker if anyone i mean anyone could help me it would be so great thank you! - Skype The_Wolf_Survival

item.title: Need help! (Jarring my server)
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

Look at this tutorial: http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/deployment/jar/build.html
You would use something like this:

The â€¦ should be replaced with any other directories that contain class files to be placed into your jar file. This can include other jar files.

You should also create a manifest file called [tt]MANIFEST.MF[/tt] containing the following:

Main-Class: server.Server or whatever is the main class.

Just look at the tutorial.

Read full topic
